title: Text Input
description: Allows users to enter any type of text

frontMatter.title: Text Input
frontMatter.description: Allows users to enter any type of text

when_to_use.value: Collecting open-ended text responses from users
Requesting names, email addresses, or similar personal information
Accepting currency amounts or numeric values
Fields where autocomplete functionality would enhance user experience

when_to_consider_else.value: For selecting from predefined options (use [Select](../select) or [Radio Button](../radio-button))
When a date picker would be more appropriate (use [Date Input](../date-input))

accessibility.value: Use descriptive labels for all inputs
Use `message-aria-describedby` for additional screen reader context
Error messages are announced to assistive technologies
Error states use color plus additional visual indicators
Required indicators are communicated via text, not symbols alone

frontMatter.code_usage:
<!-- Basic text input -->
<va-text-input
  label="First name"
  name="firstName"
  required
></va-text-input>

<!-- With validation -->
<va-text-input
  label="Email address"
  type="email"
  name="email"
  required
  hint="We'll use this to contact you"
></va-text-input>

<!-- Currency input -->
<va-text-input
  label="Monthly income"
  type="number"
  currency
  hint="Enter amount in dollars"
  min="0"
  step="0.01"
  name="income"
></va-text-input>

<!-- With character count -->
<va-text-input
  label="Description"
  name="description"
  maxlength="100"
  charcount
></va-text-input>
